property.name: Rules

property.value: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life, struck sharp on death, Makes awful lightning." - Elizabeth Barrett Browning, "Aurora Leigh"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to any target. {2}{R}{R}{R}: Return Hammer of Bogardan from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for three cards and reveal them. Target opponent chooses one. Put that card into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "'O miserable of happy! Is this the end Of this new glorious world... ?'" - John Milton, *Paradise Lost*

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gemstone Mine enters the battlefield with three mining counters on it. {T}, Remove a mining counter from Gemstone Mine: Add one mana of any color. If there are no mining counters on Gemstone Mine, sacrifice it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Exalted Angel deals damage, you gain that much life. Morph {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "She is a theme of honor and renown, ...Whose present courage may beat down our foes." - William Shakespeare, *Troilus and Cressida*

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a Beast: You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All we know about the Krosan Forest we have learned from those few who made it out alive." - Elvish refugee

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.) Target player can't cast spells this turn. If this spell was kicked, creatures can't attack this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Lorwyn's brief evenings, the sun pauses at the horizon long enough for a certain species of violet to bloom with the fragrance of mischief.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.) Sacrifice Xiahou Dun, the One-Eyed: Return target black card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard. Once during each of your turns, you may cast a creature spell from your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death tried to uncrown me. But now I return, king of a greater realm."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Doing something at the last minute isn't so bad when you can make that minute last.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Stoneforge Mystic enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. {1}{W}, {T}: You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance, indestructible Other permanents you control have indestructible.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A golden helix streaked skyward from the Helvault. A thunderous explosion shattered the silver monolith and Avacyn emerged, free from her prison at last.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a blue instant card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A rare find, suitable for the most discerning collector.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hanna was astounded. Mirri read every leaf and wisp of breeze like a book of ancient lore.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Arena Rector dies, you may exile it. If you do, search your library for a planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her call echoes across worlds, calling the loyal to battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) As Morophon, the Boundless enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Spells of the chosen type you cast cost {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay. Other creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other enchantments you control have shroud. (A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Enchanted creatures you control have shroud.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The wonders of Nyx do not belong solely to the gods."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Painter's Servant enters the battlefield, choose a color. All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are the chosen color in addition to their other colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It gathers hues from the twilight mist so that its master can paint a better world.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After a hundred failed experiments, Urza was stunned to find that common silver passed through the portal undamaged. He immediately designed a golem made of the metal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who controls more creatures than they do and is their opponent. The first player may reveal cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card. If the first player does, that player puts that card onto the battlefield and all other cards revealed this way into their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.value: "'Tis a shame, in such a tempest, to have but one anchor." - Laurence Sterne, *Tristram Shandy*

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

property.value: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fools dig for water, corpses, or gold. The earth's real treasure is far deeper."

property.value: You may reveal an instant card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. Exile Cunning Wish.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The foolish wish for that which they desire. The cunning wish for that which they require.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

property.value: {T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

property.value: ...but the price of Mangara's freedom was Asmira's life.

property.value: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

property.value: Search target opponent's library for a creature card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then discard three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To examine the causes of life, we must first have recourse to death." - Mary Shelley, *Frankenstein*

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} equal to that spell's mana value.

property.value: "Power is wasted on the weak. They never keep it for long." - Nicol Bolas

property.value: Take an extra turn after this one.

property.value: The province of Jingzhou was the fulcrum of the three kingdoms. At separate times it was coveted and controlled by the Wu, the Shu, and the Wei.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The path offered by the academy is long and difficult, but those who brave it arrive at wisdom beyond compare.

property.value: ({PB} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.) Lifelink For each {B} in a cost, you may pay 2 life rather than pay that mana. Whenever you cast a black spell, put a +1/+1 counter on K'rrik, Son of Yawgmoth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the arrogance of my youth, I believed I knew all there was to know. Now, my greatest wisdom is a humble awareness of all I have yet to learn." - Teferi

property.value: Meddling mages chant so loudly that no one can get a spell in edgewise.

property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {U}{R}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {G}{U}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rishada is the gateway to free trade - but the key will cost you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may play two additional lands on each of your turns.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not miss Jukai Forest. It is not my home. My home is Kamigawa, its people my family. Wherever I set my pack and rest my head, I am home."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Noncreature spells with mana value 4 or greater can't be cast. Noncreature spells with {X} in their mana costs can't be cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: So great is his wisdom and spirit that many who have met him say that they stood before a giant of a man and talked to the wisest of the four winds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}{U}{R}, {T}: Nin, the Pain Artist deals X damage to target creature. That creature's controller draws X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your body is a delicate instrument that tells me truths. These devices help me 'tune' that instrument."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metalcraft - {T}: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The suns of Mirrodin have shone upon perfection only once.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Spellseeker enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an instant or sorcery card with mana value 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not content with mere answers, she hunts for the truth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Eminence - Whenever you cast another Vampire spell, if Edgar Markov is in the command zone or on the battlefield, create a 1/1 black Vampire creature token. First strike, haste Whenever Edgar Markov attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Neither Urza nor Mishra would admit it, but it was their similarities, rather than their differences, that drove their obsessive rivalry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All permanents are artifacts in addition to their other types. All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are colorless. Players may spend mana as though it were mana of any color.

property.value: Trample Whenever Phyrexian Negator is dealt damage, sacrifice that many permanents.

property.value: "The tyrannous and bloody deed is done, The most arch deed of piteous massacre That ever yet this land was guilty of." - William Shakespeare, *Richard III*

property.value: Some convictions are so strong that the world must break to accommodate them.

property.value: "Thorn bushes spring up wherever the army has passed. Lean years follow in the wake of a great war." - Lao Tzu, *Tao Te Ching*, trans. Feng and English

property.value: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

property.value: "Mama says it's my imagination, but I know you'd never lie to me."

property.value: Whenever a creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you get an experience counter. At the beginning of combat on your turn, put X +1/+1 counters on another target creature you control, where X is the number of experience counters you have.

property.value: Your opponents can't search libraries. If an opponent would begin an extra turn, that player skips that turn instead.

property.value: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. • Return target creature to its owner's hand. • Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

property.value: "Each year that passes rings you inwardly with memory and might. Wield your heart, and the world will tremble."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.) Exile Teferi's Protection.

property.value: "Someday, when the world is safe again, my homeland will return." - Teferi

property.value: "The past does not determine our present."

property.value: A witch once foretold that Glavin would die surrounded by unimaginable wealth. Until that moment, he'd taken that to mean he'd be rich.

property.value: As she triggered yet another trap, Chira realized that what she thought was the goblin word for "easy" probably wasn't.

property.value: "A great leader must have the wisdom to know what's right and the courage to make it so."

property.value: "Practice alone will not bring perfection. The practice itself must be perfect. Again!"

property.value: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

Flavor
property.value: "I have seen entire civilizations rise and fall. You mortals are but dust to me." - Sorin Markov

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card. Whenever an opponent draws a card, Nekusar, the Mindrazer deals 1 damage to that player.

property.value: His enemies wondered if the lich king's brutal death and unnatural rebirth had been his plan all along.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{R}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target creature card in your graveyard, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls three or more creatures, sacrifice Defense of the Heart, search your library for up to two creature cards, put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {PU}: Change a target of target spell or ability to Spellskite. ({PU} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let's show Vorinclex that progress doesn't always need teeth or claws." - Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Friends teach what you want to know. Enemies teach what you *need* to know.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chalice of the Void enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. Whenever a player casts a spell with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Chalice of the Void, counter that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({PG} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.) {1}{PG}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, put two +1/+1 counters on Karlov of the Ghost Council. {W}{B}, Remove six +1/+1 counters from Karlov of the Ghost Council: Exile target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who say money can't buy happiness clearly don't have enough."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature card in a graveyard When Animate Dead enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with Animate Dead." Return enchanted creature card to the battlefield under your control and attach Animate Dead to it. When Animate Dead leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it. Enchanted creature gets -1/-0.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Polluted Delta: Search your library for an Island or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Wasteland: Destroy target nonbasic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The land promises nothing and keeps its promise." - Oracle *en*-Vec

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Choose target artifact a player controls and target artifact card in that player's graveyard. If both targets are still legal as this ability resolves, that player simultaneously sacrifices the artifact and returns the artifact card to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I wrecked your metal guy, boss. But look! I made you an ashtray."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When defeat is near and guidance is scarce, all eyes look in one direction.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the academy, "show and tell" too often becomes "run and hide."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Other creatures you control get +2/+2. Creatures your opponents control get -2/-2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Wasteland: Destroy target nonbasic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The land was left depleted and empty, an unsettling taste of things to come.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Zur the Enchanter attacks, you may search your library for an enchantment card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zur remained aloof from Terisiare's suffering, intent only on his own perfection.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The limbs of Pendelhaven extend as far as the meek roam, and reach as high as they strive.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile a creature you control: Add X mana of any one color, where X is 1 plus the exiled creature's mana value. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every predator is something else's prey.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any type that a land you control could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Does it reflect the future that once was or the past that can never be?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The whole of creation stood transfixed, silenced by the weight of anticipation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value greater than the number of experience counters you have, you get an experience counter. Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each experience counter you have.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Indestructible As long as your devotion to red is less than five, Purphoros isn't a creature. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Purphoros deals 2 damage to each opponent. {2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Windswept Heath: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 2 life. Whenever you gain life, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card and each opponent loses 1 life. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Oloro, Ageless Ascetic is in the command zone, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: State-based actions don't apply to you or other permanents you control. (You don't lose the game due to having 0 or less life or drawing from an empty library. Your creatures aren't destroyed due to damage or deathtouch and aren't put into a graveyard due to having 0 or less toughness. Your planeswalkers aren't put into a graveyard if they have 0 loyalty. You don't put a legendary permanent into a graveyard if you control two with the same name. Counters aren't removed from your permanents due to game rules. Permanents you control attached or combined illegally remain on the battlefield. For complete rules and regulations, see rule 704.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other enchantments you control have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.) {1}, Sacrifice Sterling Grove: Search your library for an enchantment card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Nicol Bolas, the Ravager enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card. {4}{U}{B}{R}: Exile Nicol Bolas, the Ravager, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Draw two cards. −3: Nicol Bolas, the Arisen deals 10 damage to target creature or planeswalker. −4: Put target creature or planeswalker card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. −12: Exile all but the bottom card of target player's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you wish to assassinate a master assassin, you'll have to do better than that."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wooded Foothills: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Colorless Eldrazi spells you cast cost {2} less to cast. {7}, {T}: Search your library for a colorless creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance, reach, trample When Zacama, Primal Calamity enters the battlefield, if you cast it, untap all lands you control. {2}{R}: Zacama deals 3 damage to target creature. {2}{G}: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. {2}{W}: You gain 3 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Growing Rites of Itlimoc enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. At the beginning of your end step, if you control four or more creatures, transform Growing Rites of Itlimoc.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Transforms from Growing Rites of Itlimoc.) {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Add {G} for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The true treasures of our world are found in the wild places, where Ixalli's light shines brightest." - Huatli
